meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the December 12, 2023 City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Consider and Adopt an Inducement Resolution
agenda_items.description: Declaring intent to issue bonds for a loan to LIH Paradise Gardens Preservation, LP to provide financing for a multifamily residential rental development for persons of low and moderate income (Paradise Gardens Apartments) located at 1500 N Garrett Avenue in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $18,000,000.00.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s 2023 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding the annual report of the Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of Dallas HFC Treasurer’s report for eleven months ending November 30, 2023
Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of December 31, 2023
Update from Staffing Task Force meeting held January 3, 2024
agenda_items.description: Update on the Staffing Task Force meeting.

financial_items.description: Inducement Resolution for financing for Paradise Gardens Apartments
